function.name: search_engine_query
function.description: This tool belongs to the Web Search API category. It provides functions to search the web and browse search results. Tool description: This function queries the search engine for the provided keywords and region. Note that the provided function is in Python 3 syntax.

max_results.description: The maximum number of search results to return.

region.description: The region to search in. Defaults to 'wt-wt' (No region).

function.name: fetch_url_content
function.description: This tool belongs to the Web Search API category. It provides functions to search the web and browse search results. Tool description: This function retrieves content from the provided URL and processes it based on the selected mode. Note that the provided function is in Python 3 syntax.

url.description: The URL to fetch content from. Must start with 'http://' or 'https://'.

mode.description: The mode to process the fetched content. `raw` returns the raw HTML content; `markdown` converts raw HTML content to Markdown format for better readability, using html2text; `truncate` extracts and cleans text by removing scripts, styles, and extraneous whitespace.

content.description: The processed web content as a string.

Menu

#

Welcome to

Crystal Bridges

Museum of American Art

American art and exhibitions. Stunning architecture.  
134 acres of Ozark nature. General admission is always free.

[Plan your visit](https://crystalbridges.org/plan-a-visit/)

Your browser does not support the video tag.  Play  Pause

![People in an art gallery viewing framed artwork on the wall, with others in
the
background.](https://images.crystalbridges.org/uploads/2025/01/TGM03239-Enhanced-
NR_2000-1.jpg?resize=1000%2C400&gravity)

![](https://images.crystalbridges.org/uploads/2024/10/Holly-
Bass_NWBA-1-jordan_press.jpg?resize=16%2C10&gravity)

SEP 13, 2025 – JAN 26, 2026

### _Get in the Game: Sports, Art, Culture_

**Experience how today’s artists respond to the drive, passion, and culture
surrounding games—and who gets to play them.**

[Learn more about the exhibition](https://crystalbridges.org/calendar/get-in-
the-game-sports-art-culture/)

[ _Get in the Game: Sports, Art, Culture_
](https://crystalbridges.org/calendar/get-in-the-game-sports-art-culture/)

![People watching a neon-lit geometric structure displaying their faces on
multiple screens at
night](https://images.crystalbridges.org/uploads/2025/09/Time-Warp-

Seasonal Highlights

## Fall Guide to Crystal Bridges

Plan your perfect visit to Crystal Bridges—no matter the season!

[Read our fall visitor's guide ](https://crystalbridges.org/plan-a-
visit/seasonal-highlights/cb-fall-guide/)

![Modern architecture with curved roofs by water, lush greenery, gardens, and
open gathering
areas.](https://images.crystalbridges.org/uploads/2024/11/60301_SA_CrystalBridges_N9.jpg?resize=16%2C10&gravity)

Ongoing Through 2026

### Crystal Bridges Expansion

**Your museum is growing! Become a part of our expansion journey as we
transform our galleries to create a new American art experience.**

[Learn more about the
expansion](https://crystalbridges.org/architecture/expansion/)

[ Crystal Bridges Expansion
](https://crystalbridges.org/architecture/expansion/)

![A line of people of all ages do a yoga pose in a Crystal Bridges art
gallery](https://images.crystalbridges.org/uploads/2024/04/SEI20140712_0237.jpg?resize=16%2C10&gravity)

Art & Wellness Festival

### Celebrate creativity and well-being

**Explore the intersections of art, nature, and well-being with three days of
events, keynote speakers, tours, immersive experiences, and more!**

[Learn more about the festival](https://crystalbridges.org/calendar/art-
wellness-festival/)

[ Celebrate creativity and well-being
](https://crystalbridges.org/calendar/art-wellness-festival/)

![Adults and children in Halloween costumes outdoors with pumpkins receiving
treats.](https://images.crystalbridges.org/uploads/2022/09/TGM06267-1.jpg?resize=16%2C10&gravity)

Trick Art Treat

### Have a spooky good time in the forest

**Costumes and art and candy, oh my! Bring the family and enjoy seasonal,
creative fun in the North Forest with our annual Trick Art Treat
celebration.**

[Learn more about Trick Art Treat](https://crystalbridges.org/calendar/trick-
art-treat/)

[ Have a spooky good time in the forest
](https://images.crystalbridges.org/uploads/2021/09/SEI20201031_0375-scaled.jpg)

Connect

anywhere in the world.

collection and exhibitions.

and visitor

culture app.

[Learn more](https://crystalbridges.org/digital-guide/)

[ Digital Guide ](https://crystalbridges.org/digital-guide/)

background.](https://images.crystalbridges.org/uploads/2025/06/Screenshot-2025-04-28-at-14.37.05.png?resize=16%2C10&gravity)

### Indigenous Story Map

Explore how contemporary Indigenous artists celebrate the theme of place
through quotes, interviews, and behind-the-scenes stories in this interactive
experience developed in collaboration with Broken Egg.

more](https://indigenousstorymap.crystalbridges.org/?_gl=1*dx8elp*_gcl_au*MTExNzQxMjI4MS4xNzQyMzA2NzYz)

Walton Foundation ...', 'href': 'https://alicelwaltonfoundation.org/crystal-bridges/', 'body': 'The mission of Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art is to welcome all to celebrate the American spirit in a setting that unites the power of art with the beauty of nature.
